revisionDesc.tei:change: Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
Added references to GeoNames IDs to placeNames without such references based on places mentioned in ../data/tei/gazetteer_levant-phd.TEIP5.xml but not previously present in this master file.
revisionDesc.change: Created this file through automatic iteration and manual cross-checking with the digital facsimiles.
